name: Kusanagi?
desc: Purportedly the legendary sword of Japan. However, exceptionally weak.

name: Physic
desc: Restores an ally's HP from afar.

name: Fortify
desc: Restores (User's Magic + 10) HP to all allies within range.

name: Trade
desc: Trade with a far away ally.

name: Silence
desc: Enemy is rendered unable to use magic.
components: target.wexp['Light'] or target.wexp['Anima'] or target.wexp['Dark'] or target.wexp['Staff']

name: Hammerne
desc: Repair an item to full uses.

name: Rescue
desc: Bring an ally to a space adjacent to the user

name: Warp
desc: Move an ally to another square.

name: Latona
desc: Restores HP and condition of all allied units

name: Sealing Needles
desc:
Reimu's preferred weapon to use in efficiently exterminating youkai.
Prf Reimu. Anti-Mounted, Beastkiller, Anti-Monstrous.

name: Athame
desc:
A special knife that Marisa uses as a spell. 
Prf Marisa. Physical. Magicbuster.

name: Dagon
desc: After battle, inflicts enemy with -2 Spd/Def/Res for 2 turns. Cooldown for 2 turns.

name: Nightmare
desc: Sends all enemies in range 3 to sleep

name: Maple Shield
desc: +3 Def when in inventory. Loses one durability per round of combat. Only one accessory can be equipped at a time.

name: Forged Shield
desc: +5 Def when in inventory, but -2 Spd. Loses one durability per round of combat. Only one accessory can be equipped at a time.

name: Kappatech Shield
desc: +8 Def when in inventory, but -4 Spd. Loses one durability per round of combat. Only one accessory can be equipped at a time.

name: Poppet
desc: +5 Res when in inventory. Loses one durability per round of combat. Only one accessory can be equipped at a time.

name: Misfortune Amulet
desc: +10 Res when in inventory, but -3 Def. Loses one durability per round of combat. Only one accessory can be equipped at a time.

name: Ankh
desc: +15 Res when in inventory, but -5 Def. Loses one durability per round of combat. Only one accessory can be equipped at a time.

name: Lucky Clover
desc: Negates Crits. Only one accessory can be equipped at a time.

name: Lantern
desc: Offers +3 sight in the dark. +10 Hit. Only one accessory can be equipped at a time.

name: Stone Bowl
desc: +15% Def/Res Growths, -15% Str/Mag Growths. Grants Stoneskinned. Only one accessory can be equipped at a time.

name: Torch
desc: Increases user's sight range in fog of war

name: Angelic Robe
desc: Permanently raises maximum HP by 7 points.

name: Metis's Tome
desc: Permanently raises all of the user's growth rates by 5.

name: Tengu Feathers
desc: Negates effective bonus of bows and wind magic toward user.
